title: Armin van Buuren - A State of Trance 350 [LIVE] (mp3)
description:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is originally from the 954MB OGG release put on thepiratebay by bey0nd. It\&#039;s been cut down into 8 tracks, roughly an hour each (split at the best natural point I could find around that time frame), and encoded into 160kbps mp3 files. Otherwise it\&#039;s untouched.

Cut and encoded with Audacity.

Enjoy - gexcko.
